ns0:entry.ns0:title: https://github.com/lgallard/terraform-aws-backup
ns0:entry.ns0:content: Terraform module to create AWS Backup plans. AWS Backup is a fully managed backup service that makes it easy to centralize and automate the back up of data across AWS services (EBS volumes, RDS databases, DynamoDB tables, EFS file systems, and Storage Gateway volumes).
